entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
